keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg’s tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 9/10 St Georges St., Stamford PE9 2BJ

quotes.text: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.

images.caption: Nick Clegg and Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.
Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a section for supporters to fill in with their personal details to help Harrish and the local Lib Dems win. It also mentions the victories of the Liberal Democrats in big cities and their strength over Labour since 1929.
